description: A new Seki has appeared, and she has a giant crush on Kyohei! But she`s nasty and mean-tempered to everyone else, and she may just be the most dangerous seki yet. Meanwhile, Aki is called to the offices of a certain diet member, who has big plans for the Kakashi and Karakami Village...

titles.title: 美姫(みき), 繚乱(りょうらん)
